page.title: Sabre Buys Reservation Services Company
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Sabre Holdings Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=TSG.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">TSG.N</A>, owner of the Travelocity Web site, on Thursday said it agreed to buy privately held SynXis Corp., a provider of reservation management services to hotels, for \$40 million.
